about_the_game:
Engage in video chat and interaction with cyber waifu, supporting custom character models and settings, and support workshop.

Features

  • Simulates realistic video chat effects.
  • Supports direct import of MMD character models without conversion.
  • Supports direct import of VITS voice models.
  • Deeply optimized rendering effects in the anime style.
  • Supports Steam workshop.
  • Supports multi-language.
  • Deeply optimized for low resource consumption.
  • Compatible with all other software and live wallpapers.
    [ /list ]

    NOTE

    1. Why do I need to input a ChatGPT API Key?
    CyberWaifu software does not inherently include any online chat services or content but merely serves as a bridge to access third-party online chat services. Therefore, you need to apply for an account with OpenAI and obtain your own ChatGPT API Key, which you can then input into CyberWaifu to utilize the chat feature. or you can download other 3rd-part chat service from workshop.

    2. Why do I need to agree to OpenAI's Terms of Use to access this feature?
    As ChatGPT is a service provided by OpenAI, it is essential to agree to OpenAI's Terms of Use in order to access and utilize the ChatGPT service.

    3. How can I obtain a ChatGPT API Key?
    To get your ChatGPT API Key, sign up for an account on the OpenAI website and visit to create your personal API Key.

    4. How will CyberWaifu use my ChatGPT API Key?
    CyberWaifu will only use the provided ChatGPT API Key to access OpenAI's ChatGPT chat service with your permission. CyberWaifu will not upload or disclose your ChatGPT API Key or any private information associated with it.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain AI generated content or some nudity or sexual content

name: CyberWaifu

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD HD7870, 2 GB VRAM or above
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Microphone
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660ti, AMD HD7870, 6GB VRAM or above
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Microphone

short_description: Engage in video chat and interaction with cyber waifu, supporting custom character models and settings, and support workshop.
